name: Blackout High Five
description: Blackout High Five is the new escape game from ajazgames. You will be dealing with a first entrance would be totally dark, only where you run the touch you will find light, once you find the key here you enter into next room, you will have to enter different room to find a set of color combination to solve a puzzle, hope you will enjoy this, have fabulous time playing. Fun playing escape game.
